data.name: Kulen Community Dayz 2020
data.description: IT Conference, 3 dayz, 67+ sessions and more! KulenDayz is all for meeting people from IT community and sharing experiences from everyday work. Organized by community it keeps a unique style, talks out of standard conference rooms and speakers ready for a discussion.

data.description:
AI and IoT Bulgaria Summit 2020 is a community event that will take place on Saturday, December 5, 2020 for the fith time in Bulgaria.

data.name: Shift Developer Conference
data.description: The biggest Developer Conference in Southeast Europe. This event, Shift 2020 is the seventh and will bring together more than 1300 attendees. During the two conference days, Shift becomes a meeting place for developers in the most beautiful city in the world.

data.name: FlutterConf.by Conference
data.description: FlutterConf.by is the first Belarusian conference dedicated to Flutter technology by Google. Organized by local enthusiasts together with SUP, it’s aimed to encourage knowledge and ideas sharing thus spreading out the use of the technology in the country.
